books.author: by James Patterson and Bill Clinton
books.description: President Jonathan Duncan, a Gulf War veteran and widower, takes on adversaries at home and abroad.
books.name: THE PRESIDENT IS MISSING

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: A body is found in Nantucket Harbor hours before a picture-perfect wedding.
books.name: THE PERFECT COUPLE

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A detective investigates a seemingly wholesome member of the community when an 11-year-old boy’s body is found.
books.name: THE OUTSIDER

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Three students at a sleazy for-profit law school hope to expose the student-loan banker who runs it.
books.name: THE ROOSTER BAR

books.author: by RaeAnne Thayne
books.description: The eighth book in the Haven Point series. Elliot Bailey comes back into Megan Hamilton's life.
books.name: THE COTTAGES ON SILVER BEACH

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Survivors of a mass shooting outside a mall in Portland, Me., develop different coping mechanisms and face a new menace.
books.name: SHELTER IN PLACE

books.author: by Mike Maden
books.description: Jack Ryan Jr. risks his life to protect a woman in a country on the brink of civil war.
books.name: TOM CLANCY LINE OF SIGHT

books.author: by Lauren Weisberger
books.description: Emily Charlton plans a comeback from the suburbs. From the author of "The Devil Wears Prada."
books.name: WHEN LIFE GIVES YOU LULULEMONS

books.author: by Gail Honeyman
books.description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.
books.name: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: After a stay at a psychiatric hospital, a reporter returns (reluctantly) to her hometown to cover the murders of two girls.
books.name: SHARP OBJECTS

books.author: by Kendall Ryan
books.description: A couple of surprises shake up a one-night stand.
books.name: MISTER TONIGHT

books.author: by Catherine Steadman
books.description: A documentary filmmaker and an investment banker must decide whether they should protect a secret.
books.name: SOMETHING IN THE WATER

books.author: by Sarah MacLean
books.description: Lady Felicity Faircloth makes a dangerous deal with the bastard son of a duke.
books.name: WICKED AND THE WALLFLOWER

books.author: by Kevin Kwan
books.description: A New Yorker gets a surprise when she spends the summer with her boyfriend in Singapore.
books.name: CRAZY RICH ASIANS

books.author: by Andrew Sean Greer
books.description: Winner of the 2018 Pulitzer Prize in fiction. To avoid an ex-boyfriend's wedding, a failed novelist attends literary events around the world.
books.name: LESS
